Uses of Package
com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.dissolve.fmap

Packages that use com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.dissolve.fmap
com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.dissolve.fmap   
 

Classes in com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.dissolve.fmap used by com.iver.cit.gvsig.geoprocess.impl.dissolve.fmap
DissolveVisitor
           This FeatureVisitor processes each geometry of a polygon layer, looks for adjacent polygons and verify values of a dissolve field.
IDissolveCriteria
          Implementations has the responsability of decide if Dissolver must dissolve two features.
IDissolveCriteria.IDissolvedFeatureBuilder
          Builds features from a dissolve operation.
ISpatialDissolveCriteria
          Forces to IDissolveCriteria to fetch geometries from ReadableVectorial (for performance reasons, once a criteria has verified a spatial conditions, it caches IGeometry, to avoid reading them many times)
SingleFieldDissolveCriteria
          Decides if dissolve two features based in an alphanumeric criteria: two features will be dissolved if they have the same value for a given (and single) field.
